list.name: Start of Event Frames
list.rawQuery:
SELECT UNIX_TIMESTAMP(EventFrame.StartTimestamp) AS time_sec,
	CONCAT(Element.Name, ' - ', DATE_FORMAT(EventFrame.StartTimestamp, '%m/%d/%y %H:%i')) AS text,
	CONCAT(Element.Name, ',', EventFrameTemplate.Name, ',', fxGetEventFrameFriendlyName(EventFrame.EventFrameId), ',', 'Start') AS tags
FROM EventFrame
	INNER JOIN Element ON EventFrame.ElementId = Element.ElementId
	INNER JOIN EventFrameTemplate ON EventFrame.EventFrameTemplateId = EventFrameTemplate.EventFrameTemplateId
WHERE $__timeFilter(EventFrame.StartTimestamp) AND (Element.ElementId IN ($elements))
ORDER BY EventFrame.StartTimestamp ASC

list.name: End of Event Frames
list.rawQuery:
SELECT UNIX_TIMESTAMP(EventFrame.EndTimestamp) AS time_sec,
	CONCAT(Element.Name, ' - ', DATE_FORMAT(EventFrame.EndTimestamp, '%m/%d/%y %H:%i')) AS text,
	CONCAT(Element.Name, ',', EventFrameTemplate.Name, ',', fxGetEventFrameFriendlyName(EventFrame.EventFrameId), ',', 'End') AS tags
FROM EventFrame
	INNER JOIN Element ON EventFrame.ElementId = Element.ElementId
	INNER JOIN EventFrameTemplate ON EventFrame.EventFrameTemplateId = EventFrameTemplate.EventFrameTemplateId
WHERE $__timeFilter(EventFrame.StartTimestamp) AND (Element.ElementId IN ($elements)) AND EventFrame.EndTimestamp IS NOT NULL
ORDER BY EventFrame.StartTimestamp ASC

list.name: Notes
list.rawQuery:
SELECT UNIX_TIMESTAMP(TagValue.Timestamp) AS time_sec, GROUP_CONCAT(DATE_FORMAT(Note.Timestamp, '%m/%d/%y %H:%i'), ' - ', Note.Note ORDER BY Note.Timestamp SEPARATOR '
') AS text, CONCAT(Element.Name, ',', AttributeTemplate.Name) AS tags FROM ElementAttribute INNER JOIN Element ON ElementAttribute.ElementId = Element.ElementId INNER JOIN AttributeTemplate ON ElementAttribute.AttributeTemplateId = AttributeTemplate.AttributeTemplateId INNER JOIN Tag ON ElementAttribute.TagId = Tag.TagId INNER JOIN TagValue ON Tag.TagId = TagValue.TagId INNER JOIN TagValueNote ON TagValue.TagValueId = TagValueNote.TagValueId INNER JOIN Note ON TagValueNote.NoteId = Note.NoteId WHERE (Element.ElementId IN ($elements)) AND (AttributeTemplate.AttributeTemplateId IN ($attributeTemplates)) AND $__timeFilter(TagValue.Timestamp) GROUP BY TagValue.TagValueId

list.name: Lookups
list.rawQuery:
SELECT UNIX_TIMESTAMP(TagValue.Timestamp) AS time_sec,
	LookupValue.Name AS text,
	CONCAT(Element.Name, ',', AttributeTemplate.Name) AS tags
FROM ElementAttribute
	INNER JOIN Element ON ElementAttribute.ElementId = Element.ElementId
	INNER JOIN AttributeTemplate ON ElementAttribute.AttributeTemplateId = AttributeTemplate.AttributeTemplateId
	INNER JOIN Tag ON ElementAttribute.TagId = Tag.TagId
	INNER JOIN Lookup ON Tag.LookupId = Lookup.LookupId
	INNER JOIN TagValue ON Tag.TagId = TagValue.TagId
	INNER JOIN LookupValue ON Lookup.LookupId = LookupValue.LookupId AND
		TagValue.Value = LookupValue.Value
WHERE (Element.ElementId IN ($elements)) AND
	(AttributeTemplate.AttributeTemplateId IN ($attributeTemplates)) AND
	Lookup.LookupId IN ($lookups) AND
	$__timeFilter(TagValue.Timestamp)

targets.rawSql:
SELECT UNIX_TIMESTAMP(TagValue.Timestamp) AS time_sec,
	TagValue.Value AS value,
	CONCAT(Element.Name, '_', AttributeTemplate.Name) AS metric 
FROM ElementAttribute
	INNER JOIN Element ON ElementAttribute.ElementId = Element.ElementId
	INNER JOIN AttributeTemplate ON ElementAttribute.AttributeTemplateId = AttributeTemplate.AttributeTemplateId
	INNER JOIN Tag ON ElementAttribute.TagId = Tag.TagId
	INNER JOIN TagValue ON Tag.TagId = TagValue.TagId
WHERE (Element.ElementId IN ($elements)) AND (AttributeTemplate.AttributeTemplateId IN ($attributeTemplates)) AND $__timeFilter(TagValue.Timestamp)

list.label: Enterprise:
list.name: enterprise
list.query: SELECT DISTINCT Enterprise.EnterpriseId AS __value, 	Enterprise.Name AS __text FROM Enterprise 	INNER JOIN Site ON Enterprise.EnterpriseId = Site.EnterpriseId 	INNER JOIN ElementTemplate ON Site.SiteId = ElementTemplate.SiteId 	INNER JOIN AttributeTemplate ON ElementTemplate.ElementTemplateId = AttributeTemplate.ElementTemplateId 	INNER JOIN Element ON ElementTemplate.ElementTemplateId = Element.ElementTemplateId

list.label: Site:
list.name: site
list.query: SELECT DISTINCT Site.SiteId AS __value, Site.Name AS __text FROM Site 	INNER JOIN ElementTemplate ON Site.SiteId = ElementTemplate.SiteId 	INNER JOIN AttributeTemplate ON ElementTemplate.ElementTemplateId = AttributeTemplate.ElementTemplateId 	INNER JOIN Element ON ElementTemplate.ElementTemplateId = Element.ElementTemplateId WHERE Site.EnterpriseId = $enterprise

list.label: Element Templates:
list.name: elementTemplates
list.query: SELECT DISTINCT ElementTemplate.ElementTemplateId AS __value, ElementTemplate.Name AS __text FROM ElementTemplate 	INNER JOIN AttributeTemplate ON ElementTemplate.ElementTemplateId = AttributeTemplate.ElementTemplateId 	INNER JOIN Element ON ElementTemplate.ElementTemplateId = Element.ElementTemplateId WHERE ElementTemplate.SiteId = $site

list.label: Elements:
list.name: elements
list.query: SELECT DISTINCT ElementId AS __value, CONCAT(Element.Name, ' (', ElementTemplate.Name, ')') AS __text FROM Element 	INNER JOIN ElementTemplate ON Element.ElementTemplateId = ElementTemplate.ElementTemplateId WHERE Element.ElementTemplateId IN ($elementTemplates) ORDER BY ElementTemplate.Name, Element.Name

list.label: Attributes:
list.name: attributeTemplates
list.query: SELECT AttributeTemplate.AttributeTemplateId AS __value, AttributeTemplate.Name AS __text FROM AttributeTemplate INNER JOIN ElementTemplate ON AttributeTemplate.ElementTemplateId = ElementTemplate.ElementTemplateId INNER JOIN Element ON ElementTemplate.ElementTemplateId = Element.ElementTemplateId WHERE (Element.ElementId IN ($elements))

list.label: Lookups:
list.name: lookups
list.query: SELECT Lookup.LookupId AS __value, Lookup.Name AS __text FROM Lookup WHERE Lookup.EnterpriseId = $enterprise
